data.content:
noun
US or Brit coastguard , pl ~ guards
US the Coast Guard or Brit the Coastguard :an organization that has the job of guarding the area along a country's coast and helping people, boats, and ships that are in danger on the sea
The U.S. Coast Guard is a military organization.
Their son joined the Coast Guard last year. - often used before another noun
Coast Guard officials
[count] Brit :a member of the Coastguard
